recipe-default.name: tom_yum_goong
ingredient: 3-4 Tbsp.  Coconut milk or Carnation milk
procedure: In a pot, add chicken stock and bring to the boil. Then add all herbs, chili, lemongrass,  kaffir leaves, galangal, mushrooms and continue to boil.  Let boil for 3-5 minutes.
Add shrimp ,onion, tomato‚  cook until shrimps turn pink‚  add saw coriander, coriander leaves and spring onion
Turn off the heat‚ then add, then add coconut milk + Thai chili paste and seasoning  with fish sauce, sugar, tamarind paste and lime juice.

recipe-default.name: clear_vegetable_soup
ingredient: Optional  Leafy green of your choice
procedure: In a mixing bowl, combine minced chicken, pepper powder and oyster sauce, mix well.
Bring chicken stock to a boil.  Then add garlic and coriander root.
Add minced chicken and cook for 2-3 minutes.
Add glass noodle, egg tofu, and season with soy sauce, salt and pepper powder.
Transfer to serving bowl, sprinkle with coriander leaves, spring onion, and pepper powder.
